tool_description: 徒歩の最適な移動経路を算出することができます。　Calculate the optimal route for walking.
name: NAVITIME Route(walk)
title: NAVITIME Route(walk)

api_list.name: route_walk
api_list.description: Calculate the optimal route for walking.

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description: Geodetic system of latitude and longitude. (wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: speed
optional_parameters.description: Walking speed. (Minimum value: 3, Maximum value: 8, Default value: 5). Unit is \"km/h\".  Set a numerical value for the speed per hour. Small numbers are valid up to the first place.

optional_parameters.name: options
optional_parameters.description: Additional output information. (turn_by_turn: turn-by-turn information)  Point information for guiding progress information at such as intersections.

optional_parameters.name: via_type
optional_parameters.description: Routing mode. (specified: specified order, optimal: optimal order)

optional_parameters.name: condition
optional_parameters.description: Priority considerations for walking route search. (recommend: recommended route (default),  distance: shorter distance routes)

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data. (degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

api_list.name: shape_walk
api_list.description: Return informations of route shape to draw lines on a map.

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data. (degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: speed
optional_parameters.description: Walking speed. (Minimum value: 3, Maximum value: 8, Default value: 5). Unit is "km/h".  Set a numerical value for the speed per hour. Small numbers are valid up to the first place.

optional_parameters.name: options
optional_parameters.description: Additional output information. (turn_by_turn: turn-by-turn information)  Point information for guiding progress information at such as intersections.

optional_parameters.name: condition
optional_parameters.description: Priority considerations for walking route search. (recommend: recommended route (default),  distance: shorter distance routes)

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description: Geodetic system of latitude and longitude. (wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: via_type
optional_parameters.description: Routing mode. (specified: specified order, optimal: optimal order)

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Output format (geojson: GeoJSON format (default), json: JSON format)
